scripts.build:name: npx eosio-asc testname.ts --target release
scripts.test:name: yarn build:name && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_name
scripts.test:publickey: yarn build:publickey && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_publickey
scripts.test:table: yarn build:table && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_table
scripts.test:asset: yarn build:asset && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_asset
scripts.test:action: yarn build:action && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_action
scripts.test:mi: yarn build:mi && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_mi
scripts.test:store: yarn build:store && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_store
scripts.test:serializer: yarn build:serializer && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_1serialize
scripts.test:crypto: yarn build:crypto && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_crypto
scripts.test:system: yarn build:system && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_system
scripts.test:print: yarn build:print && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_print
scripts.test:transaction: yarn build:transaction && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_tx
scripts.test:singleton: yarn build:singleton && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_singleton
scripts.test:variant: yarn build:variant && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_variant
scripts.test:gencode: yarn build:gencode && run-ipyeos -m pytest -s -x test.py -k test_gencode
